title: Genevieve Taylor Beef Skewers
description: Genevieve Taylor makes vietnamese beef skewers on the BBQ with a gorgeous lemongrass marinade.

asset.author: Napoleon Products
asset.description: Genevieve Taylor makes vietnamese beef skewers on the BBQ with a gorgeous lemongrass marinade.

transcripts: [Music] I'm making Vietnamese beef skewers on the barbecue today with a gorgeous lemongrass marinade now these bamboo skewers been soaking for a couple of hours and the beef has been marinating overnight I peeled the answer leaves from some lemon grass stalks and slice the inner core very finely I finely chopped some chalat crushed a bit of garlic and added a little faster sugar then I added some fish sauce a little bit of vegetable oil and a good grinds of black pepper I've got a piece of skirt steak here that's been in the freezer for an hour just so it's firm enough for me to slice it really thin Lee to strip the beef go straight into the lemongrass marinade and I give them a really good squish around my fingers to make sure they're well mix I've also cooked some medium egg noodles drain and thoroughly coated them in a little sesame oil some sesame seeds some salt and pepper and just left them to cool I've got my barbecue really hot now and I've got a planter on this side you could of course use a heavy frying pan as long as it didn't have any plastic handles so I'm just going to take bundles of my noodles here and just put them in little piles on the plunger and the idea is that they're going to fry until they gorgeous and golden and crisp on the outside and inside they'll still be soft and hot and lovely after about five minutes I'm going to flip the piles over don't worry if they must a little bit straggly it's absolutely fine I'll taste amazing so once the noodles are kicking on their second side it's time to get the beef skewers on now they're going to cook really quickly this is the beef is so beautifully thin so I'm just going to keep a close eye on them and turn them over once or twice formation rate it evenly so once it's all done I'm going to pile it all into some clearing dishes so noodles in here and the beef in here and I've made a really simple Vietnamese dressing to go with it it's just a blend of lime juice fish sauce a little bit of water from crushed garlic chopped surfside chili and caster sugar it's worth having a little taste at this stage to get that perfect balance of sweet salty and sharp so to serve you just take a lettuce leaf slide one of the beef skewers off onto it top that with a few of these lovely crispy noodles spring onions and a few peanuts a little drizzle of dressings and there you have it Vietnamese lemongrass beef with sesame Chris noodles [Music]
